note: I don’t need a CW - I AM a CW. GenX. Atheist. Activist. Anarcho-Syndicalist. Subgenius. Polymath. Empath. Coffee addict. Race traitor. BIPOC/AAPI/LGBTQIA+ accomplice. Rod Serling stan. Frequently NSFW. Conceived during Hurricane Camille. Currently located in the beautifully scenic boggy backwater that is Lower Dumbfuckistan, Alabama. INFP-T. Irish AF. Magats/racists/misogynists/antivaxxers blocked with insouciant glee. Because fuck you, that's why. Stay off the moors at night.
